column4: Can anyone tell me how to stop gdm from automatically starting?  i would like to start 6.06 in terminal mode and then move to graphics if and when required.
that will disable gdm from init scripts so you will get what you asked for
sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start when you need Xwindows (or startx)
